description: Modern ionizing medical imaging technology. Techniques & hardware for ionising radiation methods (X-rays, CT scans, Single Photon Emission Tomography (SPECT), Positron Emission Tomography (PET)). ELEC4601 and ELEC4602 are compatible and can be undertaken simultaneously.
prerequisites:
For ELEC4601: ELEC3004
For ELEC7606: ELEC3004 or ELEC7312
incompatible:
For ELEC4601: ELEC7606
For ELEC7606: ELEC4601
